This is more a problem with the lack of item sinks than
anything player-controlled. Items do not wear out. So when
someone upgrades, their old items are still as good as new.
It is inevitable that banded armor will reach the point where
the supply balances with the demand at a price point lower
than what it costs a blacksmith to produce, because the supply
is forever increasing.
